title: Classic Wall Sconce
description: A timeless wall sconce with a soft fabric shade, perfect for ambient lighting in hallways or living rooms.

title: Modern LED Wall Light
description: A sleek, energy-efficient LED wall light ideal for contemporary interiors.

title: Vintage Brass Wall Lamp
description: A decorative brass wall lamp with vintage detailing, adding charm to any space.

title: Industrial Wall Sconce
description: A rugged industrial-style wall sconce with exposed bulbs, perfect for loft or modern industrial interiors.

title: Adjustable Reading Wall Lamp
description: An adjustable wall lamp with swivel head, ideal for reading corners and bedrooms.

title: Rustic Wooden Wall Light
description: A wall light with a rustic wooden design, perfect for farmhouse or rustic-style interiors.
